oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The effects of selenium, housing and management on the incidence of pneumonia in housed calves
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Phillippo, M.
Arthur, J. R.
Price, J.
Halliday, G. J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The occurrence and incidence of pneumonia in housed calves were not related to the selenium status of the herd as measured by blood glutathione peroxidase activity nor were they affected by selenium treatment of calves during the neonatal period. Full article published in Veterinary Record (1987) 121, 509-512
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1987; 133
